name: Pika Software Builder Project File
summary: Learn about .PIKA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you are finished editing your Pika Software Builder project, you can export it as a Windows program (.EXE file). Pika Software Builder programs are compatible with Windows XP, Vista, and 7.
NOTE: Pika Software Builder is discontinued.

description: Developer file created by Pika Software Builder, a Windows software development application that helps users create Windows programs (.EXE files) without having to write source code; saves the program window as well as buttons, labels, text fields, images, and any other user interface elements saved in the window.
